channel.title: My sponsored application
channel.description: So I started bidding on my the bidding website and I didnt know I had to have an application up before the 1st. I have actually waited all through Feb. just to do this bidding I really hope that I do not have to wait another month to get my application approved. Please tell me if its possible to get my application approved after bidding. I will pay what I have added to the bid, unless it deleted it for some reason after i posted my application. Thank you very much.

item.title: My sponsored application
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I’ve reported the thread for a moderator to review, hopefully they can control anything else you need.

Read full topic

item.title: My sponsored application
item.dc:creator: @jcrane164 jcrane164
item.description:
@jcrane164 wrote:

I cant even see the bidding list because of this message “Your sponsored server application has been received, but not yet reviewed, please be patient and allow at least 24-48 hours for review. Do not post another application.” can you please notify someone so i can place a higher bid if needed. Thank you this would be very nice of you.

Read full topic

item.title: My sponsored application
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

jcrane164:

Im not so sure i know how to pay when the bidding is over.

I’ve never actually bid on a server so I’m not 100% sure, I think it displays a pay now option after bidding is finished though so as long as you visit http://moparisthebest.com/sponsbid.php on the 10th and pay if you’re in the top 10 you should be fine

Read full topic

item.title: My sponsored application
item.dc:creator: @jcrane164 jcrane164
item.description:
@jcrane164 wrote:

Im not so sure i know how to pay when the bidding is over.

Read full topic

item.title: My sponsored application
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

jcrane164:

Oh ok then… I didnt know so can you delete my application or reapprove so i can see the current bids? And i am safe to be gold on the tenth if my bid is in the top 10?

I’m not staff so I don’t have any access to that side of that board, sorry. But yes, if your bid is still in the top 10 when voting closes you will be a gold sponsored server :).

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jcrane164 jcrane164
item.description:

item.title: My sponsored application
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I just seen that you’ve already submitted a bid, your OP was unclear as to what your intentions were :o. However, if you’ve already submitted a bid then you must have been approved in the past by an administrator so there is no need to post another application.

Read full topic

item.title: My sponsored application
item.dc:creator: @jcrane164 jcrane164
item.description:
@jcrane164 wrote:

I just submitted the application before I posted this thread but I did read what was posted and it said that there will not be any applications approved through the bidding dates which is 1st - 10th it stated that there is no reason too. So I just want to know if my application will still be approved.

Read full topic

item.title: My sponsored application
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

If you wish to apply for a sponsored server you can post in this board using this format, an administrator will approve it once they are online.

If you read all of the terms and conditions moparisthebest listed in that topic you should be fine for the end of bidding, good luck!

Read full topic
